actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amended the Higher Education Act of 1965 to provide that vacational schools may qualify as eligible institutions for purposes of federally insured student loans while in a preaccreditation status.

summary.text: Provides, under the Higher Education Act, that vocational schools may qualify as eligible institutions for purposes of federally insured student loans while in a preaccreditation status.

titles.title: A bill to amended the Higher Education Act of 1965 to provide that vacational schools may qualify as eligible institutions for purposes of federally insured student loans while in a preaccreditation status.
